thread.title: BRIEF-Superior Energy Services Posts Q4 Adj. Loss $0.33/Shr From Continuing Operations

title: BRIEF-Superior Energy Services Posts Q4 Adj. Loss $0.33/Shr From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Superior Energy Services Inc:
* SUPERIOR ENERGY SERVICES ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE $497 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.33 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SUPERIOR ENERGY SERVICES - ‍ RECORDED A PROVISIONAL INCOME TAX BENEFIT OF $76.5 MILLION DURING Q4 DUE TO ENACTMENT OF U.S. TAX ACT​
* ‍SOLD LESS PROPPANT DURING Q4, WHICH IMPACTED REVENUE * ‍REVENUE WAS LOWER IN GULF OF MEXICO, PRIMARILY DUE TO LOWER COMPLETION SERVICES ACTIVITY​
* ‍ A GULF OF MEXICO SUBSEA WELL INTERVENTION PROJECT WAS SUSPENDED AFTER A SUBCONTRACTED CONTROL SYSTEM FAILED​
* ‍ EXPECT TO RESUME COMMERCIAL OPERATIONS DURING SECOND HALF OF 2018 FOR GULF OF MEXICO SUBSEA WELL INTERVENTION PROJECT​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.32, REVENUE VIEW $509.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
